verses.verse: In the seventh<WH7637> month<WH259>, in the one and twentieth<WH6242> day of the month<WH2320>, came the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> by<WH3027> Haggai<WH2292> the prophet<WH5030>, saying<WH559>,

according to the word<WH1697> that I covenanted<WH3772> with you when ye came<WH3318> out of Egypt<WH4714>, and my Spirit<WH7307> abode<WH5975> among<WH8432> you<WH3372>: fear ye not.

For thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: Yet once<WH259>, it is a little while<WH4592>, and I will shake<WH7493> the heavens<WH8064>, and the earth<WH776>, and the sea<WH3220>, and the dry land<WH2724>;

The silver<WH3701> is mine<WH2091>, and the gold is mine<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.

The latter<WH314> glory<WH3519> of this house<WH1004> shall be greater than<WH1419> the former<WH7223>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>; and in this place<WH4725> will I give<WH5414> peace<WH7965>, saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.

In the four<WH702> and twentieth<WH6242> day of the ninth<WH8671> month<WH8147>, in the second year<WH8141> of Darius<WH1867>, came the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> by<WH3027> Haggai<WH2292> the prophet<WH5030>, saying<WH559>,
Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: Ask<WH7592> now the priests<WH3548> concerning the law<WH8451>, saying<WH559>,

If one<WH376> bear<WH5375> holy<WH6944> flesh<WH1320> in the skirt<WH3671> of his garment<WH899>, and with his skirt<WH3671> do touch<WH5060> bread<WH3899>, or pottage<WH5138>, or wine<WH3196>, or oil<WH8081>, or any food<WH3978>, shall it become holy<WH6942>? And the priests<WH3548> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559>, No.

Then said<WH559> Haggai<WH2292>, If one that is unclean<WH2931> by reason of a dead body<WH5315> touch<WH5060> any of these<WH2930>, shall it be unclean? And the priests<WH3548> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559>, It shall be unclean<WH2930>.

Then answered<WH6030> Haggai<WH2292> and said<WH559>, So is this people<WH5971>, and so is this nation<WH1471> before<WH6440> me<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>; and so is every work<WH4639> of their hands<WH3027>; and that which they offer<WH7126> there is unclean<WH2931>.
And now<WH7760>, I pray you, consider from this day<WH3117> and backward<WH4605>, before<WH2962> a stone<WH68> was laid<WH7760> upon a stone<WH68> in the temple<WH1964> of Jehovah<WH3068>.

Through all that time<WH935>, when one came to a heap<WH6194> of twenty<WH6242> measures<WH6235>, there were but ten; when one came<WH935> to the winevat<WH3342> to draw out<WH2834> fifty<WH2572> vessels<WH6333>, there were but twenty<WH6242>.
I smote<WH5221> you with blasting<WH7711> and with mildew<WH3420> and with hail<WH1259> in all the work<WH4639> of your hands<WH3027>; yet ye turned not to me<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>.

Consider <WH7760>, I pray you<WH3117>, from this day and backward<WH4605>, from the four<WH702> and twentieth<WH6242> day<WH3117> of the ninth<WH8671> month<WH3117>, since the day that the foundation<WH3245> of Jehovah<WH3068>'s temple<WH1964> was laid<WH7760>, consider it.

Is the seed<WH2233> yet in the barn<WH4035>? yea<WH1612>, the vine, and the fig-tree<WH6086>, and the pomegranate<WH7416>, and the olive<WH8384> - tree<WH8384> have not brought forth<WH5375>; from this day<WH3117> will I bless you<WH1288>.
And the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came the second<WH8145> time unto Haggai<WH2292> in the four<WH702> and twentieth<WH6242> day of the month<WH2320>, saying<WH559>,
Speak <WH559> to Zerubbabel<WH2216>, governor<WH6346> of Judah<WH3063>, saying<WH559>, I will shake<WH7493> the heavens<WH8064> and the earth<WH776>;

and I will overthrow<WH2015> the throne<WH3678> of kingdoms<WH4467>; and I will destroy<WH8045> the strength<WH2392> of the kingdoms<WH4467> of the nations<WH1471>; and I will overthrow<WH2015> the chariots<WH4818>, and those that ride<WH7392> in them<WH5483>; and the horses and their riders<WH7392> shall come down<WH3381>, every one<WH376> by the sword<WH2719> of his brother<WH251>.

In that day<WH3117>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, will I take<WH3947> thee<WH2216>, O Zerubbabel, my servant<WH5650>, the son<WH1121> of Shealtiel<WH7597>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, and will make<WH7760> thee as a signet<WH2368>; for I have chosen<WH977> thee<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.
